1.12.2.1.1.1:
Added some new configs for pack makers for limiting Pipe and Barrel properties
Fixed Basic Sequencer not pushing out items on a redstone pulse
Added a GUI button to the Sequence Detector to change the output redstone pulse length
Fixed/changed/unified the sneak + left/right click actions on the Pipes
1.12.2.1.1.0:
Several bug fixes
Several feature tweaks and improvements
Added a Strict Sequential Filter
Added RS- and T-latches
Added a Block Placer Property Configurator item
Added optional slim models for most machines

1.12.1.1.0.1:
Fixed the Crafter getting partially stuck, if the output is full
Fixed a recipe conflict, and adjusted several other recipes
Fixed the Splitter's secondary output not getting loaded from NBT (= when loading from disk, or moving with frames) if it's pointing North, which also leads to a crash
Fixed the redstone state of machines not getting set initially, if they are placed next to a power source
Fixed the Pipes' Placement Property for the delay having the wrong value range
Prevent changing Placement Property values while holding shift (it gets annoying in Creative mode)
Don't allow stacking non-stackable items in the Barrels or Trash Buffer
Improved some tooltips and GUI InfoAreas
